definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Audio and video devices generally use this transfer type.

sentences.english: Last month I talked about how to write a device driver for radio-tuner cards.

sentences.english: This paper presents a blind audio watermarking algorithm with self-synchronization based on Psychoacoustic Model.

sentences.english: This paper deals with the characteristics and application of audio_video techniques in preparation of network education courseware.

courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
